p: The animals underwent fasting, and then, blood samples were collected. The fasting blood glucose (FBG) levels, triglyceride (TG), total cholesterol, low‐density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL‐c), and high‐density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDL‐c), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and aspartate aminotransferase (AST) were measured in serum samples using commercially available kits and according the manufacturer's instructions (Pars Azmun, Iran). Urine volume and urine glucose levels were measured, and urinary glucose excretion rate was reported as g glucose/day.
